Ingredients.5: 1 ear fresh corn, kernels cut from cob

Ingredients.8: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers

Ingredients.9: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, lime, and cilantro (such as RO*TEL®)

Ingredients.15: 1 pound fresh cod, cut into bite-sized pieces

Ingredients.16: 0.75 pound fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined

Ingredients.17: 0.25 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, or to taste

Directions.1: Heat olive oil in a stockpot over medium heat. Add onion and cook until translucent, 5 to 7 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.

Directions.2: Add carrots, corn, and celery and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add chicken stock, tomatoes, ancho chili, chili powder, and cumin and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes.

Directions.3: Meanwhile, place clams and mussels in a bowl of cold water to filter out sand.

Directions.4: Drain clams and mussels; add to the soup. Stir in cod and shrimp. Cover and boil until cod is white and flaky, mussels and clams are open, and shrimp is pink, 5 to 10 minutes. Serve immediately, topped with cilantro and avocado.
